price: Ɔkaa sε: “Nokorε sε madͻ nnepa ama abroso akyεn me Wura Nyankopͻn ho adwendwen akosi sε (awia) akͻ wura (anadwo} ntware mu akyi {anaasε awia akͻtͻ).
arabic: فَقَالَ إِنِّيٓ أَحۡبَبۡتُ حُبَّ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّي حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتۡ بِٱلۡحِجَابِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: faqāla innī aḥbabtu ḥubba al-khayri ʿan dhik'ri rabbī ḥattā tawārat bil-ḥijābi
